pages.text: $(li)Ghast are large white floating host-like hostile creatures that can be found in the Nether.$(br)$(li)They shoot explosive fireballs to you.$(br)$(li)They may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gunpowder)Gunpowder$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ghast_tear)Ghast Tears$(/l) on death.
